author: MARY CLARE JALONICK
title: All smiles, Jackson tries for Senate reset on Supreme Court
description: WASHINGTON (AP) — Engaging in lawyerly small talk, Missouri Sen. Josh Hawley was telling Supreme Court nominee Ketanji Brown Jackson this past week how he met his wife while clerking at the high court.
